oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Country roads near the Hermitage, 1954 April
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An April 1954 view of the countryside roads and fence near the Hermitage, home of Andrew Jackson, located twelve miles from Nashville in Hermitage, Tennessee. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hermitage (Hermitage, Tenn.)
